scripts.updatelocalexplorer: cd ../../explorer && npm install && npm run build && npm pack && mv *.tgz ../azores23/Vault && cd ../azores23/Vault && npm uninstall @bitcoinerlab/explorer && npm install ./bitcoinerlab-explorer-*.tgz && rm ./bitcoinerlab-explorer-*.tgz
scripts.updatelocaldiscovery: cd ../../discovery && npm install && npm run build && npm pack && mv *.tgz ../azores23/Vault && cd ../azores23/Vault && npm uninstall @bitcoinerlab/discovery && npm install ./bitcoinerlab-discovery-*.tgz && rm ./bitcoinerlab-discovery-*.tgz
